Uses of Interface
StateMachine.LWRState

Packages that use LWRState
StateMachine   
 

Uses of LWRState in StateMachine
 

Classes in StateMachine that implement LWRState
 class LWRError
          The LWRError is a save State the robots is automatically set in if an error occurs.
 class LWRGravComp
          In This State the LWR is set to GravitationsCompensation mode so that robot can be moved without constraints
(package private)  class LWRIdle
          In This State the LWR is holding its position with a maximum stiffness.
 class LWRMoveToPose
          In This State the LWR is moving to a specified position in Cartesian space.
 class LWRPathImp
          In This State the LWR can be moved along a linear Path in one direction to a specified position in Cartesian space.
 class LWRVirtualFixtures
          In this State two different kinds of Virtuall Fixtures, a plane and a cone are definied and the Stiffness and Damping values are calculated due to there distance to the defined Fixtures.
 

Fields in StateMachine declared as LWRState
 LWRState LWRStatemachine.m_CurrentState
          The current State of the LWR state machine
 LWRState LWRStatemachine.m_newState
          The new State of the LWR state machine
 

Methods in StateMachine with parameters of type LWRState
 void LWRStatemachine.ChangeLWRState(LWRState newState)
          This function change the current state of the robot to the new state.
